analysis: The project is a well-structured web application with a focus on modularity and reusability. It uses modern tools like React, TypeScript, and Vite, and includes a comprehensive set of UI components. The project also supports theming and error handling. However, there are opportunities to further optimize performance and maintainability.

improvements.description: Standardize the naming conventions and structure of UI components to enhance consistency and ease of use across the project.
Review and optimize custom hooks for better performance and reusability, ensuring they follow best practices.
Refactor context providers to improve scalability and maintainability, such as splitting large contexts into smaller, more focused ones.
Optimize page components for better performance, such as implementing lazy loading for large or infrequently used pages.
Review utility functions for potential refactoring to improve readability and maintainability, such as breaking down complex functions into smaller, more focused ones.
